channel.title: CVE Feed for NI -- LabVIEW
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NI -- LabVIEW

item.title: CVE-2024-23612|2024-10-10T20:30:00.781Z -- ni -- labview
item.description: An improper error handling vulnerability in LabVIEW may result in remote code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to provide a user with a specially crafted VI. This vulnerability affects LabVIEW 2024 Q1 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-23609|2024-10-10T20:29:07.987Z -- ni -- labview
item.description: An improper error handling vulnerability in LabVIEW may result in remote code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to provide a user with a specially crafted VI. This vulnerability affects LabVIEW 2024 Q1 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-6638|2024-08-01T21:41:04.317Z -- ni -- labview
item.description: An integer overflow vulnerability due to improper input validation when reading TDMS files in LabVIEW may result in an infinite loop. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to provide a user with a specially crafted TDMS file. This vulnerability affects LabVIEW 2024 Q1 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-4080|2024-07-24T15:08:57.252Z -- ni -- labview
item.description: A memory corruption issue due to an improper length check in LabVIEW tdcore.dll may disclose information or result in arbitrary code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to provide a user with a specially crafted VI. This vulnerability affects LabVIEW 2024 Q1 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-4079|2024-07-23T14:12:00.156Z -- ni -- labview
item.description: An out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check in LabVIEW may disclose information or result in arbitrary code execution. Successful exploitation requires an attacker to provide a user with a specially crafted VI. This vulnerability affects LabVIEW 2024 Q1 and prior versions.
